headline: Should Dollar General’s (DG) New Board Leadership Change How Investors View Its Strategy and Execution?
summary: Dollar General Corporation recently announced that David P. Rowland has been appointed chairman of the board effective February 4, 2026, succeeding Michael M. Calbert, while longtime director Warren F. Bryant plans to retire at the 2026 annual meeting after serving since 2009. This leadership transition blends continuity with fresh board oversight, at a time when commentators highlight Dollar General’s operational execution and evolving customer mix. Next, we’ll examine how Rowland’s...
